mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW=#{pw}
SELECT id, name, phone, email FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME=#{name}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE ID=#{id}
